item.title: 中文
item.description: 一个人死了，还会有人想起他，就算不错。 —— 汪曾祺 做了人类想成仙；生在地上要上天。 —— 鲁迅

item.title: English
item.description: Information is physical. by Rolf Landauer As far as the laws of mathematics refer to reality, they are not certain; and as far as they are certain, they do not refer to reality. by Albert Einstein (translated by George Barker Jeffery and Wilfrid Perrett) The opposite of a profound truth may well be another profound truth. by Niels Bohr

item.description: This is the first try to create an article to show on my website.
